title: My "First" Balanced Champion. Farlk. The Galactic General
body:
This guy is melee not ranged

HP 492 +81  3.8/5 sec +.74
Internal Battery: 100% +1% per second Killing enemies grant 2% battery. Champions refill battery. Not effected by blue buff.
If battery goes below 3%, he will be silenced and not allowed to cast spells until he gains at least 40% battery.
If battery is used to 0% , after casting the spell, his armor shuts down for 2 minutes and comes back at full battery.
However, if a spell would shut his suit, a red warning triangle will be in front of the icon.
AD 42+3.78
Atk Speed 0.728 +0.011
Armor 25 +2.5
MR 25 +2.5
Speed 340


Passive: Galactic Battle Armour Can be turned on or off.
 Farlk takes 20% Less damage from abilities.
 This is increased to 50% for DoT abilities.
Maintains Movement speed and defense. Turning off passive is strongly not suggested. 
Deactivation causes the battery to recharge quicker, however, he has no personal strengths, his armor is everything, his armor and mr drops to 1, damage drops by 50%
Speed drops by 100, since the powerless suit is so heavy.
However, it increases Battery charge rate from 1 to 13% per second.
To activate, he will reactivate after 6 seconds of channeling, during channeling, any damage stuns him for 2 seconds. And activation is reset.
He may not reactivate within 5 seconds of turning it off.


Q: Power Rifle. Cost 32/30/28/26/24% Battery 3.5 second cooldown.
Farlk pulls out a rifle, and fires at a chosen direction. 525 Range. On contact, knocks back 125 units, deals 15/20/30/50/90+40% Physical damage
contact damage.
 On contact heat explodes nearby, burnings nearby units and the target for Levelx 2 Magic Dmaage per second for 3 seconds.

W: Fallen General 31/30/29/28/27 seconds.  If Q is not learnt, he will only kick. 
No battery for first two, but will not shoot rifle if no battery is ramining. Rifle costs same as current Q cost.
Farlk demonstrates his martial arts on his unfortunate victim.

Farlk summons his rifle using it to bash into his chosen opponents face, dealing 45%AD +25/40/70/115/175 Physical Damage.
Then he kicks them away, dealing 20%AD +20/30/40/50/60 AD Knockback 475 range.
Then blasts towards the cursor with his rifle. Dealing the same damage as Q(Power Rifle).

E: Drone Strike. 45% Battery. 17 second cooldown.
Farlk summons in a military Drone to wreak havoc on the battlefield.
The Drone showers an area with flare, Dealing minor damage and destroying projectiles in the area. Including allied projectiles. 
Deals 8/11/14/17/20+ 7%AD damage/sec for 7 seconds. or until deactivated or destroyed. Drone can take 5 projectile hits. Spells count.
. Only cleans projectiles once per second, when the flare rains.

R: Target Acquired. 40/35/30% battery 260/220/180 second cooldown.
Farlk leaps into the air before smashing back down into the ground at a chosen location within 800 range, upon in contact with the ground, he breaks the earth beneath him in a 400 radius area. Knocking up all units and stuns them upon landing for 1 seconds. Deals 125%AD +120/240/360 Magic Damage on landing.

Using this ability refreshes all ability cooldowns and causes his next basic attack to deals 20/25/30% Bonus damage and stun .5/.75/1 second.
This stacks if you want it to.

ROFL, you just don't get it.

Once more, you have failed to establish an identity.
You have an AD champ with plenty of damage, that also gets tank level defenses from his passive, and has CC that makes champs like Amumu, Malphite and Naut jelly.
Yeah, just stop trying mate, cause you're getting a bad reputation around the boards ATM
im getting bad reputation cos people only look at the bad points not the good ones. Look at the bright side of life, its why idgaf
So you think making a champion in LoL that's more broken than Yasuo is positive?
But yasuo isnt even that broken, yi can easily kill him
you should look at his weaker sides too. his battery charges slowly, abilities dont do that much damage. CC isnt all that viable, only his ult ad E kinda.
to be fair i reckon he isnt all that op. he has long cooldowns too.
im starting to think u didnt carefully read most of it, im almost sure u most likely didnt look at the words and only the numbers

If you want to design a melee champ, give them some melee abilities.
The closest you come is the w, but that still adds a ranged attack.

Things like gap closers, buffs and melee attacks fit melee champs, not kiting knockbacks. In saying this, putting gap closers and disengagement (such as knockback) on the same champion leaves little room for counterplay, so has to be tackled very carefully (Jayce for example).

You need to focus on identity, try making them fit a role, tank/ADC/APC/support etc, not just a champ that can do everything.

From a design aspect, ignoring numbers, none of your suggestions fit a specific role, as is the modus operandi of Riot.

And every time someone points out flaws in your creations, you respond with "I think it's cool and balanced" while ignoring the point that everyone is telling you that it isn't.
aye i suppose so. I'll stop for now..... im gonna come up with something later. I'll take ur points.

I saw an ADC with passive %dmg reduction, 2 knockbacks and an AoE knockup/stun.

You need to examine existing champions, and see how things like damage reduction go on tanks, not ADC's, how things like multiple crowd control effects don't go on ADC's, and how teamfight winning AoE stuns definitely do not go on ADC's.

Just stahp.
